Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Classes
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlAttr
          As of 2.2, no more used, pleas use DomAttr instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.SubmitMethod
          As of 2.2, please use HttpMethod instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlAttr
          As of 2.2, no more used, please use DomAttr instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.addHostsToProxyBypass(String)
          As of 2.2, use ProxyConfig instead (see WebClient.getProxyConfig()) 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.appendDomChild(DomNode)
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.appendChild(Node) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.cloneDomNode(boolean)
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.cloneNode(boolean) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement.getAttributeEntriesIterator()
          As of 2.0 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement.getChildElementsIterator()
          As of 2.0, use HtmlElement.getChildElements(). 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getChildIterator()
          As of 2.0, use DomNode.getChildren(). 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage.getDocumentHtmlElement()
          As of 2.1, please use HtmlPage.getDocumentElement() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage.getElementWithFocus()
          As of 2.0, please use HtmlPage.getFocusedElement() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getFirstDomChild()
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.getFirstChild() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomAttr.getHtmlValue()
          As of 2.2, please use DomAttr.getValue() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getLastDomChild()
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.getLastChild() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.InputElementFactory.getLog()
          As of 2.0, use local log variable enclosed in a conditional block. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getLog()
          As of 2.0, use local log variables enclosed in a conditional block. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getNextDomSibling()
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.getNextSibling() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getParentDomNode()
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.getParentNode() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode.getPreviousDomSibling()
          As of 2.0, please use DomNode.getPreviousSibling() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequestSettings.getSubmitMethod()
          As of 2.2, please use WebRequestSettings.getHttpMethod() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequestSettings.getURL()
          As of 2.2, use WebRequestSettings.getUrl() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.isCookiesEnabled()
          as of 2.3 use CookieManager.isCookiesEnabled() instead 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage.moveFocusToElement(HtmlElement)
          As of 2.0, please use HtmlPage.setFocusedElement(HtmlElement) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.HttpWebConnection.newWebResponseInstance(String, WebResponseData, long, SubmitMethod, URL)
          As of 2.2, no more used, please use HttpWebConnection.newWebResponseInstance(String, WebResponseData, long, WebRequestSettings) instead 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.popFirstWindow()
          since 2.0 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.pushClearFirstWindow()
          since 2.0 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.removeHostsFromProxyBypass(String)
          As of 2.2, use ProxyConfig instead (see WebClient.getProxyConfig()) 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.setCookiesEnabled(boolean)
          as of 2.3, use CookieManager.setCookiesEnabled(boolean) instead 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomAttr.setHtmlValue(String)
          As of 2.2, please use DomAttr.setValue(String) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.setProxyHost(String)
          As of 2.2, use ProxyConfig instead (see WebClient.getProxyConfig()) 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClient.setProxyPort(int)
          As of 2.2, use ProxyConfig instead (see WebClient.getProxyConfig()) 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequestSettings.setSubmitMethod(SubmitMethod)
          As of 2.2, please use WebRequestSettings.setHttpMethod(HttpMethod) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequestSettings.setURL(URL)
          As of 2.2, user WebRequestSettings.setUrl(URL) instead. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode()
          As of 1.12 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.MockWebConnection(WebClient)
          as of HtmlUnit-2.3. Use MockWebConnection.MockWebConnection() instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequestSettings(URL, SubmitMethod)
          As of 2.2, please use WebRequestSettings.WebRequestSettings(URL, HttpMethod) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebResponseImpl(WebResponseData, String, URL, SubmitMethod, long)
          As of 2.2, please use WebResponseImpl.WebResponseImpl(WebResponseData, String, WebRequestSettings, long). 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebResponseImpl(WebResponseData, URL, SubmitMethod, long)
          As of 2.2, pleas use WebResponseImpl.WebResponseImpl(WebResponseData, URL, HttpMethod, long) instead. 
com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebWindowImpl()
          As of 1.12
